languages.text: {n}Арджента опускается на колени, творя знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}. Взгляд ее прикован к размашистой подписи на {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патенте{/g} — столь обыденной, казалось бы, вещи, просто росчерку на бумаге... если не знать, чьей рукою оставлен этот росчерк, и чья кровь обагрила лист.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента опускается на колени, творя знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}. Взгляд ее прикован к размашистой подписи на {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патенте{/g} — столь обыденной, казалось бы, вещи, просто росчерку на бумаге... если не знать, чьей рукою оставлен этот росчерк, и чья кровь обагрила лист.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента опускается на колени, творя знак {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилы{/g}. Взгляд ее прикован к размашистой подписи на {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патенте{/g} — столь обыденной, казалось бы, вещи, просто росчерку на бумаге... если не знать, чьей рукою оставлен этот росчерк, и чья кровь обагрила лист.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands forming the Sign of the Aquila. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the Warrant — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a paper... unless one knows whose hand left the flourish and whose blood is on the paper.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔跪在地上，双手比着{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势。她的目光凝聚在{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}潦草的签名上。那仅仅是个看起来平淡无奇的签名，不过是纸上的装饰罢了……除非有人知道那是谁的手写下的字迹，纸上沾的是谁的鲜血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔跪在地上，双手比着{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}的手势。她的目光凝聚在{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}潦草的签名上。那仅仅是个看起来平淡无奇的签名，不过是纸上的装饰罢了……除非有人知道那是谁的手写下的字迹，纸上沾的是谁的鲜血。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta cae de rodillas, haciendo la señal del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} con la mano. Mira fijamente la firma de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Es algo aparentemente mundano, una decoración sobre el papel... a no ser que alguien sepa de quién es la firma y a quién pertenece la sangre del papel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta cae de rodillas, haciendo la señal del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} con la mano. Mira fijamente la firma de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Es algo aparentemente mundano, una decoración sobre el papel... a no ser que alguien sepa de quién es la firma y a quién pertenece la sangre del papel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは膝を付き、両手で{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を結ぶ。彼女の目線は{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}に記された力強い署名に注がれている。一見すると、ありふれた紙切れのようにも見えた…誰の手がその印を残し、誰の血がその紙に付いているのかを、知らなければの話だが。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは膝を付き、両手で{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を結ぶ。彼女の目線は{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}に記された力強い署名に注がれている。一見すると、ありふれた紙切れのようにも見えた…誰の手がその印を残し、誰の血がその紙に付いているのかを、知らなければの話だが。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta fällt auf die Knie, ihre Hände machen das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}. Ihr Blick fixiert die schwungvolle Unterschrift auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} – etwas vermeintlich Banales, nur einige Schnörkel auf einem Blatt Papier ... außer man weiß, wessen Hand sie geschrieben hat und mit wessen Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta fällt auf die Knie, ihre Hände machen das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}. Ihr Blick fixiert die schwungvolle Unterschrift auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} – etwas vermeintlich Banales, nur einige Schnörkel auf einem Blatt Papier ... außer man weiß, wessen Hand sie geschrieben hat und mit wessen Blut.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta tombe à genoux et forme le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} avec ses mains. Ses yeux sont fixés sur la signature élégante de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} : un détail insignifiant en apparence, une simple fioriture sur un morceau de papier... sauf quand on sait qui a laissé cette marque et ce sang sur le document.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta tombe à genoux et forme le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} avec ses mains. Ses yeux sont fixés sur la signature élégante de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} : un détail insignifiant en apparence, une simple fioriture sur un morceau de papier... sauf quand on sait qui a laissé cette marque et ce sang sur le document.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, diz çöküp ellerini {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} şeklinde birleştiriyor. Gözleri, {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} üzerindeki göz alıcı imzaya kilitlenmiş durumda. Bu imza, bir parça kâğıdı süsleyen sıradan bir imgeye benziyor. Ancak bu, izne ve kâğıda bulaşan kanın sahibini tanıyanlar için çok daha fazlasını ifade ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta drops to her knees, her hands making the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}. Her eyes are locked on the sweeping signature on the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} — a seemingly mundane thing, merely a flourish on a piece of paper... unless one knows whose hand left that mark and whose blood is on that paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, diz çöküp ellerini {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} şeklinde birleştiriyor. Gözleri, {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'nin üzerindeki göz alıcı imzaya kilitlenmiş durumda. Bu imza, bir parça kâğıdı süsleyen sıradan bir imgeye benziyor. Ancak bu, izne ve kâğıda bulaşan kanın sahibini tanıyanlar için çok daha fazlasını ifade ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
